TODAY.
5.Q:WOULDN'T THAT BE A VIOLATION OF THE ARMS TREATY IS

6.A: WE WENT THROUGH THIS EXACT SAME GROUND ONCE BEFORE AND

8.A: THAT'S A FAIR INFERENCE.
9.Q: ARE YOU SAYING THAT THEY ARE CONSTRUCTING SOMETHING
UNDERGROUND WHICH CAN BE SOMETHING OTHER THAN SILOS?
